quotes.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.speaker: Confucius

quotes.quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
quotes.speaker: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.speaker: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.speaker: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.speaker: Sam Levenson
